mapper.insert: INSERT INTO program ( employee_no, program_name, program_content, program_max_customer, active ) VALUES ( #{employeeNo}, #{programName}, REPLACE(#{programContent}, '\r\n', '\\r\\n'), #{programMaxCustomer}, #{active} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.program_no programNo, e.employee_id employeeId, p.program_name programName, p.program_content programContent, p.program_max_customer maxCustomer, p.active programActive, p.createdate createdate, p.updatedate updatedate FROM program p INNER JOIN employee e ON p.employee_no = e.employee_no WHERE program_no = #{programNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE program SET active = #{programActive}, program_max_customer = #{maxCustomer}, program_content = #{programContent}, updatedate = NOW() WHERE program_no = #{programNo}
